class.name: DVTheme
class.brief_description: Resource that centralizes palette, typography, and component style settings for DataViz UI Kit controls.
class.description:
DVTheme packages all configurable look-and-feel data needed by [DVComponent] based controls. A theme carries global colors, spacing, animation timing, and nested style resources for specific component families such as charts, tiles, gauges, and grid panels. Components automatically react to the [signal theme_changed] signal when connected through [DVThemeManager], enabling instant restyling across a dashboard.
Themes can be authored in the inspector or constructed in code before being applied to individual widgets.

signal.name: theme_changed
signal.description: Emitted whenever any property or nested style resource on the theme changes. Components listen for this to refresh their visuals.
